definition: lift, raise, to raise into position by or as if by means of tackle
examples: Cargo was hoisted up into the ship.
let it hoist to the upper deck

definition: an act of raising or lifting : an act of hoisting (see hoist entry 1)
examples: gave him a hoist over the wall

definition: an apparatus (such as a tackle or a hydraulic lift) for lifting or raising : an apparatus for hoisting (see hoist entry 1)
the height of a flag when viewed flying
